comment.body: @Cablecat: the msg of "Your broswer is not safe"  means you are in Tor Always Mode, and you are still using insecure browser instead of Tor Browser. Tor is blocked in China, so you have 2 choices: 1. set a proxy for Tor in order to make Tor work again; 2. leave Tor Always Mode and some of your connections will bypass Tor ( No longer anonymous). Bottom line, you can always find the Chinese forum address in my profile to learn useful tips about ZeroNet.
@Cablecat: you have to allow JS on 127.0.0.1, check the NoScript Add-on setting
@Cablecat: if u only allow JS from 127.0.0.1, I don't think it would weaken if u only browse trusted zites.
